# Security Badges Reference

Add these badges to README.md to show security status:

## GitHub Actions Workflow Badges

```markdown
[![Security Scanning](https://github.com/Lemniscate-world/Neural/actions/workflows/security.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Lemniscate-world/Neural/actions/workflows/security.yml)
[![Security Audit](https://github.com/Lemniscate-world/Neural/actions/workflows/security-audit.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Lemniscate-world/Neural/actions/workflows/security-audit.yml)
```

## Alternative Security Badges

```markdown
[![Known Vulnerabilities](https://snyk.io/test/github/Lemniscate-world/Neural/badge.svg)](https://snyk.io/test/github/Lemniscate-world/Neural)
```

## Usage

Add to README.md after the existing badges (around line 6-13):

```markdown
[![Security Scanning](https://github.com/Lemniscate-world/Neural/actions/workflows/security.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Lemniscate-world/Neural/actions/workflows/security.yml)
```
